definition[0]: the act of bringing something new or different to a place where it did not previously exist, or something that arrives in this way
example[0]: restrictions on the importation of American movies
definition[1]: the business of bringing things into a country from other countries in order to sell them
example[1]: a law prohibiting the importation of tuna
definition[2]: the activity or process of bringing things into a country from abroad in order to sell them
example[2]: US law prohibits importation of prison-made goods.
